A4.text: Charlie Hunnam as Raleigh Becket: A former Jaeger pilot who is called back into action after his brother is killed in battle.

A5.text: Hunnam was also considered for the role of Prince Nuada in del Toro's previous film, Hellboy II: The Golden Army.
